channel.title: Monsters Attack Back
channel.description:
Just Wondering, How would i configure a server to make the monsters not attack back, like most servers. When the monsters in my server attack they hit like 30s 40s and 50s at lvl 3-22. I would appreciate someone telling me how to fix that. Thanks!!
~~Zach~~
P.S. Sorry if Wrong Section.

item.title: Monsters Attack Back
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“zacharybush, post:4, topic:230738”]I am a great coder, there are very few things i do not know how to do
but i have the occasional fault to where i have to rely on these forums
with people who always say “leeched or Wrong Section or HAHA MOD LOCK!”
thats why i hate posting here, like you sitting there say “correct me if im wrong, but u said
you are a good coder”?.. i dont need critisizm so gtfo. I didn’t ask for it and i
dont want it. Unless you posted to help. Do Not post at all.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2008, 09:23:13 pm[/size][hr][quote author=zraffz link=topic=303799.msg2435987#msg2435987 date=1221187868]
Correct me if I’m wrong but your last topic says you are a “good coder”, doesn’t it?
[/quote]And Yes i meant it to be pointed towards you…[/quote]If you are a good coder then tell me what a boolean is (without looking on google).

Read full topic

item.title: Monsters Attack Back
item.dc:creator: @ixl_p0tz_ixl ixl p0tz ixl
item.description:
@ixl_p0tz_ixl wrote:

If its rsc, to make them not attack just edit the agressive to and to change the str, def, and attack just simply change them to the stats you would like. These can all be found in Npcdef, if its rs2, idk and dont care to.

Read full topic
